justification: B is 1-7 and needs reliable, healthy production; trading a healthy Tier 2 WR (Justin Young) for an Out, Tier 5 WR (Lucas Allen) contradicts that. B already has multiple Tier 2 TEs, so TE ‘depth’ is not a compelling gain, though Darian Taylor is an upgrade over Liam Adams. The rationale mislabels Allen as a steadier WR and ignores B’s urgency and preferences for consistency. Acceptance probability is overstated.
